column2: 35-44 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I took Capmist for 3 days and had trouble sleeping.  I experienced mood swings, not able to sleep, hallucinations and anxiety.  Not a good drug for me.  12 hours I stopped taking Capmist, I started to feel better and was able to sleep.

column2: nomorecoughplease!, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: This drug makes me dizzy so I can not take it during the day when it was prescribed.  It made my throat and mouth dry, which made me cough more.  It did however break up the mucus in my lungs.

column2: 35-44 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: This drug is not a cure for illness, it simply helps the symptoms to help you feel better. It does have a nasty after taste. I also only take it at bedtime as it "knocks me out".

column2: alabamaman, 55-64 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: Does exactly what it says it will!  I have no insurance, but this costs less than most co-pays.

column2: mklslp, 35-44 Female  on Treatment for 1 to less than 2 years (Patient)
45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: Took one pill and had severe pain and presure in my head, nausea, dizziness and tremors  Would rather suffer with sinusitis than ever take this again.

column2: 65-74 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
CJ, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: Wow I can actually breathe and when I cough it's productive.

column2: MISSwint, 19-24 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I have been prescribed this because of a persistent cough, and sinus congestion...and yes, this medication does do what its supposed to, but I have had trouble with excessive drowsiness, trouble focusing, and hallucinations the first two nights i took this. It makes it hard to do tasks at work and do my schoolwork.

column2: 25-34 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: while taking this medication i notice its breaking the cough up very well, but making my nose and eyes run like crazy, its a very good drug but it works way to well, it will break all the up in your lungs and you will cough, it has also helped with the double ear infection i had from the sinuse infection i had

column2: StillCoughing, 19-24 on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I was not completely happy with this treatment. Not only does the medicine lack in what it's supposed to help fight against, but it has a terrible odor to it that makes it hard to swallow if you smell it at all before popping it into your mouth. It did not help me against my head or chest congestion, but it helped my cough a bit. I would not reccomend taking this for a severe cold or flu, something like Tylenol or Advil Cold and Flu would work much better for you. It did for me.

column2: 19-24 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: Had a sinus infection with a real nasty cough and congestion. The doc gave me an Rx for Capmist DM and it just works. I don't cough as much as what I did when I wasn't using it and it clears up the nasal airways great!

column2: ramona, 55-64 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: i had a cold and an asthma attack. the doc gave me prednizone,theophyllin,and doxycyclin which i took to n avail for 5 days. on the 5th day i received this capmist and within 4 hr the coughing up phlem and wheezing an blowing my nose was cut by 90%. this morning its all gone THANK GOD! this is one of the best meds on the market made for asthma relief, and believe me i've took many.thank you for letting me share this with you.

column2: CaronA, 45-54 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I had the worst head cold and this tablet worked quickly to break up congestion.

column2: 19-24 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: When I took this medicine, it did relive my cough, but the side effects were awful! I was dizzy, began yelling for no reason, crying for no reason, and quit taking the medicine after just one dose. I do not reccommend this to ANYONE!

column2: hoohoo, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: Finally a product other than Mucinex to treat a cold!  Under $15.00 and it works!

column2: 35-44 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I have dealt with bad sinus problems for years and most products sent my heart racing.  My doctor said to try this and it is the first one I can take without my heart beating like crazy. I am very happy!

column2: 45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
hoosierbuck, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: this broke up my congestion, but literally kept me up all night coughing it up.  Finally had to change meds after 2 days - needed some sleep.

column2: Mike, 25-34 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I have suffered from sinus problems for years and this is the best medication my doctor has ever given me to relieve my symptoms quick and doesn't keep me up at night.  I would recommend this to anyone
